resources.string: Smile Camera
Not enough storage to take a picture, please clean up first
I am running out of storage. Please delete some picture or apps first.
ok, let us take a photo
ok, get ready for taking pictures
Please stand in front of me, or I can not catch you.
I cannot see you. Please stand in front of me.
please stay in front of me or I can not see you
Hi, please stay right in front of me for a better quality picture
please take a pose
I cannot see you. Please stand in front of me next time. Exit photo-taking.
Setting the focus. Keep the cool pose
I am tuning the focus. Stay still please
Say cheese
Stay still and say cheese!
Stay still and smile!
Nice picture! You can check it on our app on your phone now
I got the photo, please watch it by logging into the app on your phone
Well done. You can check the photo by logging into the app on your phone
well, Exit photo-taking
